head.title: Top-level modules in the CVS repository

sect3.para:
The top-level directories in the NetBSD CVS repository related to the NetBSD sources (i.e. the sources shipped to users) and their contents are:
src The main NetBSD system sources, that is, the contents of the system source tree excluding those pieces in other top-level directories in the CVS repository (listed here).
xsrc The NetBSD X Window System source tree.
pkgsrc The NetBSD packages collection.
htdocs The NetBSD webpages, HTML and sources.

Extra care must be taken when importing files. Imports which involve code going into multiple top-level directories must be broken into a separate import per top-level directory.
If you encounter other problems, please update this page!
